captions.text:
- THERE'S SOMETHING IMPORTANT
I HAVE TO DO RIGHT NOW.
I HAVE A FRIEND NAMED MICHELLE,

AND SHE'S OUT OF TOWN
THIS WEEK,

AND SHE HAD TO LEAVE
HER HUSBAND ALONE,

AND SHE WASN'T SURE HOW HE WAS
GONNA HANDLE BEING ALONE,

SO SHE GAVE ME A LIST
OF QUESTIONS

AND ASKED ME IF I WOULD CHECK
ON HIM

AND SEE IF HE'S DOING
THESE THINGS.
LET'S SEE IF HE'S THERE.

MICHELLE'S HUSBAND,
ARE YOU THERE?
- I AM HERE.
[cheers and applause]
- ALL RIGHT.

MR. PRESIDENT, MICHELLE SAID
SHE'S OUT OF TOWN,

AND SHE WANTED TO KNOW, DID YOU
MAKE YOUR BED THIS MORNING?
THAT WOULD BE NO.

AND, YOU KNOW, WHEN
SHE'S OUT OF TOWN,

THINGS GET A LITTLE SLOVENLY
AROUND THE HOUSE.

SOCKS EVERYWHERE.
SHOES.
- HAVE YOU EATEN TODAY,

AND ARE YOU TAKING CARE
OF YOURSELF?
DID YOU EXERCISE?
- I DID EXERCISE.
I DID EAT.

AND I ATE HEALTHY,
AND I HAD SOME CARROT STICKS
ALONG WITH THE POTATO CHIPS.
- OKAY, GOOD.
IT BALANCES OUT.
OKAY, AND YOU TOOK YOUR VITAMINS

AND YOU'RE ALL SET FOR DINNER
AND ALL THAT, RIGHT?

- [chuckles] I'M ALL SET.
- ALL RIGHT, GOOD.

title: Ellen Checks in on Pres. Barack Obama

comments.text:
+Inverse Atom
The point is that when Bush was doing the same or worse, people like you 
whined endlessly that it was an act of treason to criticize a president 
during wartime. The same people who are trying to attach the meme of 
"vacation president" to Obama were silent when Bush took more than three 
times as many vacation days. Deficits didn't matter under Bush; but 
starting in January of 2009 they became a national crisis. In other words, 
you have zero credibility when it comes to any kind of political 
observation and you're an embarrassment to yourselves and to the country 
whenever you open your mouth and think you're sounding politically aware.

comments.author: bathsheba dailey

comments.text:
But than again he's a pope, there's no need for celebrity endorsement. What 
you have to understand is that all of this is a "game". And by "this" I 
mean politics. Obama is doing job when he talks to celebrities and does 
shows with comedians, by targeting voters. You may not realize it but he 
is. It's all apart of propaganda. He does what he can to get more people on 
his side to help if he wants to run for some type of office in the future. 
And celebrity endorsement is a great way. Think about. As president you go 
on tv shows with a wide amount of viewers(mostly teens, young adults, and 
women) then you run for governor or mayor. By making an appearance on the 
Ellen Show your targeting women, who by the way make up an majority of 
voters, and your "putting them on your side" or at least trying to persuade 
them to be on you side. Come election time for what ever you're running 
for; and young adults and women make up the majority of votes and you win! 

Remember when Obama first made it into office. There was a big ordeal about 
Oprah helping Obama win by all her endorsement. Because it's mostly women 
that watch Oprah, when Oprah spoke on his behalf it's said that it 
persuaded most women to vote for him thus giving him most of the female 
votes.

into Ellen or social media, a smart person is going to take advantage of 
that and get their message out any way they can. Watch every other 
president from now on use social media. Why?Because it actually works.

comments.author: saloalv someguy

comments.text:
+Dan K Obama continues to lead the United States down the path of European 
Union-style decline, with incredible levels of public debt, currently 
standing at nearly $17 trillion, which is a per person debt of over 
$50,000. Forbes reports that in California, Obamacare is expected to 
increase individual health insurance premiums by up to 146 percent. One of 
the most serious flaws with Obamacare is that its blizzard of regulations 
and mandates drives up the cost of insurance for people who buy it on their 
own. Obama’s national security strategy is confusing at best and weak at 
worst, causing a vacuum in leadership which land-hungry leaders like Putin 
are more than happy to fill. The IRS targeting of conservative groups has 
been particularly damaging, with 76 percent of voters supporting the 
appointment of a special prosecutor to investigate the scandal, and a 
series of Congressional hearings putting the Obama administration on the 
spot. In the aftermath of the barbaric killing of Ambassador Stevens and 
three other Americans on September 11, 2012 at the hands of al-Qaeda linked 
Islamist militants, serious questions have arisen over the Administration's 
handling of the crises. Also, veteran reporters such as Bob Woodward, one 
of two journalists who broke the Watergate scandal, have found themselves 
on the sharp end of the White House’s boot after publishing unflattering 
stories. Woodward was warned earlier this year by a senior White House 
official that he would “regret” his remarks about the president’s handling 
of the sequester issue. Shall I continue?
comments.author: Jeremy Hiebert
